definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Dead-zone operator is adopted in the adaptive algorithm, which improves the robustness of the algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 自適應算法中採用了死區算子，增強了算法的魯棒性。

sentences.english: The experiments show that the watermarking is perceptually invisible and robustable.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，水印具有良好隱蔽性和魯棒性。

sentences.english: The performance of the starter is robust.
sentences.chinese: 且軟起動器具有較好的魯棒性。

sentences.english: The simulation result indicates that the method has strong robustness.
sentences.chinese: 仿真結果表明，本方法具有較好的魯棒性。

sentences.english: Line shift text watermarking algorithm, strong robustness, use of boundary.
sentences.chinese: 行移文本水印算法，強魯棒性，邊界掃描採用投影法。

sentences.english: The simulation indicates this control strategy has remarkable self-adaptability and robustness character.
sentences.chinese: 仿真證明，該控制策略具有良好的自適應性和魯棒性。

sentences.english: Dead-zone operator is adopted in the adaptive algorithm to improve the algorithm's robustness.
sentences.chinese: 自適應算法中採用了死區算子，增強了算法的魯棒性。

sentences.english: It has the characteristic of less counting quantity and stronger robustness.
sentences.chinese: 該算法具有計算量小，魯棒性較強的特點。

sentences.english: The proposed algorithm solved the conflict of watermark robustness and perceptual invisibility.
sentences.chinese: 算法很好地解決了水印魯棒性和不可見性之間的矛盾。

sentences.english: This paper improves the decoupling control scheme with the impedance tracking.
sentences.chinese: 文中以阻抗跟蹤法改善交叉解耦控制的魯棒性。

sentences.english: The experimental results show that the algorithm has better robustness and fidelity.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果證明該算法具有較好的魯棒性和高保真性。

sentences.english: Orthogonal transforms are traditionally realized by "multiplication addition arithmetic" with less robustness.
sentences.chinese: 傳統上都採用“乘加算術”實現正交變換，魯棒性差。

sentences.english: The robustness analysis gives template parameter inequalities which guarantee the corresponding CNNs working well for performing prescribed tasks.
sentences.chinese: 魯棒性分析給出了完成相應功能的參數不等式。

sentences.english: The algorithm has robustness and realiability.
sentences.chinese: 算法具有魯棒性和實用性。

sentences.english: It is believed that the work will help the design of robust watermarks.
sentences.chinese: 相信，這一工作有助於更強魯棒性的水印算法的設計。

sentences.english: Emulated experiment results show that this method is robust and feasible.
sentences.chinese: 仿真實驗結果表明這種方法的強魯棒性和可行性。
